channel.title: Help handcannon {pi}
channel.description:
Hey,
I got everything of handcannon. The special works and how the player wear it works but only 1 thing. When I spec it normal shots but when I atk with normal shot it slash like melee + he shot a cannonbal. How I can make it he dont hit like melee? Please help!
